comment: When for each element ` y ` there is a subset ` A ` which may substituted for ` x ` such that ` y ` satisfying ` ch ` implies ` x ` satisfies ` ps ` then the intersection of all ` x ` that satisfy ` ps ` is a subclass the intersection of all ` y ` that satisfy ` ch ` . (Contributed by RP, 17-Oct-2020.)
